abstract: Michigan judge agrees to remove Zachary Anderson from state sex offender registry; Anderson faced 25-year presence on list for having sex with 14-year-old girl he met on dating app when he was 19.
lead_paragraph: The young man had been sentenced to spend decades on the list after admitting he had sex with a 14-year-old girl who said she was 17.

headline.main: Michigan: Young Man Spared From Sex Offender List
headline.print_headline: Michigan: Young Man Spared From Sex Offender List

snippet: The young man had been sentenced to spend decades on the list after admitting he had sex with a 14-year-old girl who said she was 17.
